name: Hungy The Fish
description:
Meet the cute fish Hungy! He is very hungry. Try to find some food for this little fellow. But keep in mind that Hungy is not the only one who searches for the food. Beware of the larger fish - you can easily become a dinner for them yourself. Also, avoid the garbage floating around. It is definitely not what Hungy wants to eat.

Use the on-screen joystick to control Hungy.
